NotDuke frees your mind of having to remember things you need to do. It's,

2. navigate to the folder that the download file is in using the ```cd``` command

Adds a todo task to the list for NotDuke to track.
Adds a deadline task to the list for NotDuke to track.
Adds an event task to the list for NotDuke to track.
Shows a list of all tasks tracked by NotDuke.
Deletes the specified task tracked by NotDuke.
- Deletes the task at the specified ```[Index]```.
- The index refers to the index number shown in the displayed task list.
- The index **must be a positive integer** 1, 2, 3, ...
- ```list``` followed by ```delete 2``` deletes the 2nd task in the task list.
Marks a specified task tracked by NotDuke as done.
- Marks the task at the specified ```[Index]``` as done.
- The task at the specified ```[Index]``` has to be not marked for the task to be marked.
- The index refers to the index number shown in the displayed task list.
- The index **must be a positive integer** 1, 2, 3, ...
- ```list``` followed by ```mark 2``` marks the 2nd task in the task list.
Unmarks a specified marked task tracked by NotDuke as not done.
- Unmarks the task at the specified ```[Index]``` as undone.
- The task at the specified ```[Index]``` has to be marked for the task to be unmarked.
- The index refers to the index number shown in the displayed task list.
- The index **must be a positive integer** 1, 2, 3, ...
- ```list``` followed by ```unmark 2``` unmarks the 2nd task in the task list.
List tasks whose task name contain any of the given keyword.
Remind user of tasks which are happening within the next 7 days.
- The remind feature will also be shown at startup
Saves all the current tasks and exits the program.

* Represents a Deadline which is a type of Task
/** The date the Deadline is due */

* @param name The name of the Deadline
* @param by The date in which the Deadline is due
* @param status The status of the Deadline
public Deadlines(String name, LocalDateTime by, Boolean status) {
* @InheritDoc Includes task type Deadlines to string.
* @InheritDoc Includes task type Deadlines to string.
* Represents an Event which is a type of Task
/** The start date and time of the Event */
/** The end date and time of the Event */
* Constructs a Event object with the specified name, the start and end date of the Event and mark whether it is
* @param name The name of the Event
* @param from The start date and time of the Event
* @param to The end date and time of the Event
* @param status The status of the Event
public Events(String name, LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to, Boolean status) {
* @InheritDoc Includes task type Events, from date and to date to string.
* @InheritDoc Includes task type Events, from date and to date to string.
* Represents a Task object added by the user. A Task object contains a String corresponding to the name of
* the task and a boolean to signify if the task is completed.
* Constructs a Task object with the specified name and mark whether it is done.
* @param name The name of the task
* @param isDone The status of the task
* Returns a String representation of the task used for saving the task. The String will contain information such
* as the name of the task and the status.
* Returns a String representation of the task if task is occurring on the date given.
* @param date the date to check if task was active
* @return the string representation of task if date is within task timeframe, or an empty string if it is not
* Returns a String representation of the task if task name contains string.
* @param match the date to check if task was active
* @return the string representation of task if string is within task name, or an empty string if it is not
* Returns true if the name contains the string given, false otherwise
* @return true if name contains string, false otherwise
* Returns a String representation to be printed out to display for the user. The String will contain information
* such as the name of the task and status.
* @return the string representing the task to be printed
* Returns a string to be printed to inform the user that the task has been marked. Updates the isDone variable in
* the Task object to true as well.
* @return the string informing user that task has been marked to be printed
return "Nice! I've marked this task as done:" + this.taskInfo();
* Returns a string to be printed to inform the user that the task has been unmarked. Updates the isDone variable in
* the Task object to false as well.
* @return the string informing user that task has been unmarked to be printed
return "OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:" + this.taskInfo();
* Represents a ToDo which is a type of Task

* @InheritDoc Includes task type ToDos to string.

* A List that is used to contain the Tasks inputted by the user.

* Adds the new task into the list as well.
* @param newTask The task to be added into the TaskList
* @return The string to be printed that indicates add was successful
return "Got it. I've added this task:\n" + newTask.taskInfo() + listStatus();
* Returns a string to be printed which contains all the String representation of the tasks in the TaskList.
* @return a string representation of all the task in the TaskList.
String output = "Here are the tasks in your list\n";
* Returns a string to be printed which informs the user how many elements are in the TaskList.
* @return a string with the size of the TaskList
return "Now you have " + length + " task" + (length > 1 ? "s" : "") + " in the list.\n";
* Returns a string to be printed which indicates that the deleting of task at index in TaskList was successful.

* @return a string that indicates delete was successful
* @throws NotDukeException if index > number of tasks
public String delete(int index) throws NotDukeException {
return "Noted. I've removed this duke.task:\n" + listStatus();
* Returns a string to be printed which indicates that the marking of task at index in TaskList was successful.
* Marks the task at index given from the list as well.
* @param index the index of the task to be marked
* @return a string that indicates mark was successful
* @throws NotDukeException if index > number of tasks or task was already marked
public String mark(int index) throws NotDukeException {
* Returns a string to be printed which indicates that the unmarking of task at index in TaskList was successful.
* Unmarks the task at index given from the list as well.
* @param index the index of the task to be unmarked
* @return a string that indicates unmark was successful
* @throws NotDukeException if index > number of tasks or task was already unmarked
public String unmark(int index) throws NotDukeException {
